matador::null_sql_logger Class Reference

#include <basic_sql_logger.hpp>

Detailed Description

Implements the basic_sql_logger to do no logging at all. This is used as the default logger for all connections and statements.

Member Function Documentation

◆ on_close()

void matador::null_sql_logger::on_close ( )
inlineoverridevirtual

No logging on closing a connection.

Implements matador::basic_sql_logger.
